title: How should I choose a topic and on what topic should I write an article for a blog? - Quora

response.answer_text: Writing is a very beautiful art. But choosing a topic to write is something difficult and confusing. To select a theme and write on it, you should be aware of these things. Know your niche. Knowing your niche is quite important as it will excel you more in that field. Be acknowledged with today's scenario. You can write what's all happening in today's world. Keep your thoughts alive. You can keep your thoughts alive by expressing what you feel. Expression is always through writing what you feel. Keep practicing, Keep writing!!!
